diagnosis.final_diagnosis: multidrug-resistant tuberculosis due to Mycobacterium bovis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with a hard mass and a lung nodule, with a history of productive cough and elevated sputum positivity for acid-fast bacilli. Cultures confirmed M. bovis, resistant to multiple antituberculosis drugs, leading to surgical resection as the only treatment option due to the lack of effective pharmacological agents.
